languages.text: "Вглядывайтесь во тьму, скрывающую правду: не отводите глаз, ибо смотрящий узреет подлинную суть вещей и могущество Истины".

traits.locale_text: "Вглядывайтесь во тьму, скрывающую правду: не отводите глаз, ибо смотрящий узреет подлинную суть вещей и могущество Истины".

languages.text: "Peer into the darkness that conceals the true path — avert not your eyes, for the one who looks will witness the essence of things and the power of the Truth."
languages.original_text: "Вглядывайтесь во тьму, скрывающую правду: не отводите глаз, ибо смотрящий узреет подлинную суть вещей и могущество Истины".

traits.locale_text: "Peer into the darkness that conceals the true way — avert not your eyes, for the one who looks will witness the essence of things and the power of the Truth."
"Peer into the darkness that conceals the true way — avert not your eyes, for the one who looks will witness the essence of things and the power of the Truth."
"Peer into the darkness that conceals the true path — avert not your eyes, for the one who looks will witness the essence of things and the power of the Truth."
"Peer into the darkness that conceals the true path — avert not your eyes, for the one who looks will witness the essence of things and the power of the Truth."
"Peer into the darkness that conceals the true path — avert not your eyes, for the one who looks will witness the essence of things and the power of the Truth."
"Peer into the darkness that conceals the true path — avert not your eyes, for the one who looks will witness the essence of things and the power of the Truth."

languages.text: “要凝视黑暗，不要移开视线。真正的道路就隐藏在黑暗之中。窥见道路之人，将会看到事物的本质，见证真理的力量。”
languages.original_text: "Peer into the darkness that conceals the true path — avert not your eyes, for the one who looks will witness the essence of things and the power of the Truth."

traits.locale_text: “要凝视黑暗，不要移开视线。真正的道路就隐藏在黑暗之中。窥见道路之人，将会看到事物的本质，见证真理的力量。”

languages.text: «Mira la oscuridad que oculta el verdadero camino. No apartes la mirada, pues quien mire presenciará la esencia de las cosas y el poder de la Verdad».
languages.original_text: "Peer into the darkness that conceals the true path — avert not your eyes, for the one who looks will witness the essence of things and the power of the Truth."

traits.locale_text: «Mira la oscuridad que oculta el verdadero camino. No apartes la mirada, pues quien mire presenciará la esencia de las cosas y el poder de la Verdad».

languages.text: 「真の道を隠す暗闇を見つめよ…目を逸らしてはいけません。見つめる者は、物事の本質と真実の力を目撃するでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Peer into the darkness that conceals the true path — avert not your eyes, for the one who looks will witness the essence of things and the power of the Truth."

traits.locale_text: 「真の道を隠す暗闇を見つめよ…目を逸らしてはいけません。見つめる者は、物事の本質と真実の力を目撃するでしょう」

languages.text: "Blickt in die Dunkelheit, die den wahren Pfad verbirgt – wendet Eure Augen nicht ab, denn wer sieht, erkennt die Essenz der Dinge und die Macht der Wahrheit."
languages.original_text: "Peer into the darkness that conceals the true path — avert not your eyes, for the one who looks will witness the essence of things and the power of the Truth."

traits.locale_text: "Blickt in die Dunkelheit, die den wahren Pfad verbirgt – wendet Eure Augen nicht ab, denn wer sieht, erkennt die Essenz der Dinge und die Macht der Wahrheit."

languages.text: « Sondez les ténèbres qui occultent la véritable voie... Ne détournez pas le regard, car telle est la seule façon de contempler l'essence des choses et le pouvoir de la Vérité. »
languages.original_text: "Peer into the darkness that conceals the true path — avert not your eyes, for the one who looks will witness the essence of things and the power of the Truth."

traits.locale_text: « Sondez les ténèbres qui occultent la véritable voie... Ne détournez pas le regard, car telle est la seule façon de contempler l'essence des choses et le pouvoir de la Vérité. »

languages.text: "Gerçek yolu gizleyen karanlığa bakasın, sakın gözünü kaçırmayasın. Kaçırmayasın ki maddenin özünü ve Hakikat'in kudretini görebilesin."
languages.original_text: "Peer into the darkness that conceals the true path — avert not your eyes, for the one who looks will witness the essence of things and the power of the Truth."

traits.locale_text: "Gerçek yolu gizleyen karanlığa bakasın, sakın gözünü kaçırmayasın. Kaçırmayasın ki maddenin özünü ve Hakikat'in kudretini görebilesin."
